entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 06:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:28 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow along parts of the coast before morning. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 06:28 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow along parts of the coast in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:28 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
